name: Acelerar Technologies
description:
Acelerar is a leading KPO firm offering a wide range of KPO services. Our services include virtual assistants, data entry outsourcing, human resource outsourcing, call center services, e-commerce product listing service, data cleansing service, data verification service, list building service and many more.  
Virtual Assistant
Use your time wisely where it matters most. Hire our virtual assistants and delegate them petty tasks you shouldn’t be doing, and focus on your core business activities.
Data Entry
Don’t hire a resource and shell out a big salary for data entry work when you can get work done in a fraction of that cost. You can outsource your data entry work to us and save both time and money. 
Call Center Services
Whether it is outbound calling or inbound calling, you can save a great deal of money by outsourcing call center services to us. Contact us for more details.  
eCommerce
Be a part of e-commerce revolution with us. We can do catalog processing, catalog updating, product image editing, bulk product uploading and many more. For more details, contact us. 
List Building
A long list of your customers and prospects is a key to success in today’s highly competitive market. We can build a big list of your prospects, thereby helping you generate more business. Contact us for more details.
